name: The Great North
story: Conquer the wild beasts, defeat the white-walkers, tame the wild moose; fate of the world rests on your shoulders
nav: enter 1 to go to Bear Island or 2 to Winterfell

name: Rainforest Cove
story: this mysterious forest will test your resolve, but your name will never be forgotten amongst men, time is of the essence
nav: enter 1 to go to Cave of Wisdom or 2 to Belge Armory

name: Deadly Desert of Doom
story: the treacherous paths are testy and only for the brave, ogres, orcs, dragons; these are scary. You may need some help along the way
nav: enter 1 to go to Remarkables or 2 to Earnslaw Burn

name: Bear Island
story: you're challenged by a bear defending her cubs and territory
nav: enter 1 to go to White Harbor or 2 to Winterfell or 3 to TGN

name: White Harbor
story: There's a very good trout bar here, you may want to eat your fill, it's a long road ahead
nav: enter 1 to go to Dark Hedges or 2 to Winterfell or 3 TGN

name: Winterfell
story: you made some unusual alliance here, some magical elves come to your aid
nav: enter 1 to go to Greywater Watch or 2 to Pingvillir Gorge or 3 TGN

name: Dark Hedges
story: Bandits attacked you; your wit, guile, and bravery is called to action
nav: enter 1 to go to Pingvillir Gorge or 2 to Greywater Watch or 3 to TGN

name: Greywater Watch
story: The vantage point gives you a clearer view of the path ahead, you have enough advantage now, plan yourself for success. What! The one-eyed monster didn't give you a chance

name: pingvellir Gorge
story: This stage is filled with lava formed rocks with sharp edges, be careful not to fall lest it could be the end of you
nav: enter 1 to go to Marble Arch Caves or 2 to Greywater Watch or 3 to TGN

name: Marble Arch Caves
story: Hurray!! You found one gem, the mission is just partly done
nav: enter 1 to go to RFC or 2 to DDD or 3 to Cave of Wisdom

name: Cave of Wisdom
story: This cave holds many secret archives about the gems, and where and how to find them. This place could provide you a shortcut to them if you choose wisely.
nav: enter 1 to go to Belge Armoury or 2 to Porto Velho or 3 to Hornets Haven

name: Belge Armoury
story: Help yourself to any ammo you want, this was the Belgians Armoury in the days of King Leopolds. You'll need every weapon you can carry, it is an uncertain road ahead
nav: enter 1 to go to Congo or 2 to RFC

name: Porto Velho
story: you find yourself surrounded by crocs, you need a miracle to escape this
nav: enter 1 to go to La Luna Rota or 2 to RFC or 3 to Congo

name: Congo
story: You're attacked by a three-headed Pterodactyl,  you have to either escape their wrath else it's game over
nav: enter 1 to go to Hornets Haven or 2 to RFC or 3 to Porto Velho

name: La Luna Rota
story: The amazing waterfall and scenic views are mesmerizing; you decided to take a nap in the Seabreeze. You unfortunately overslept and missed the ship

name: Hornets Haven
story: Their sting and number are just overwhelming, can you withstand their stings
nav: enter 1 to go to Braemer or 2 to la Luna Rota or 3 to RFC

name: Braemar
story: Hurray!! You found one gem, the mission is just partly done
nav: enter 1 to go to TGN or 2 to DDD or 3 to Meteora

name: Remarkables
story: The mountains and rivers are remarkable, but it's just a faï¿½ade the orcs lurk and you must fight or flight
nav: enter 1 to go to Earnslaw Burn or 2 to Paradise or 3 to DDD

name: Earnslaw Burn
story: The waterfalls and melting glaciers are refreshing, but don't be fooled, dementors are o the prowl. Fight or flight.
nav: enter 1 to go to hobbiton or 2 to DDD

name: Paradise
story: Don't disturb the ogres and this will be paradise. Unfortunately for you, these ogres are grumpy today, can you fight your way out?
nav: enter 1 to go to dragon Stone or 2 to Hobbiton or 3 to DDD

name: Hobbiton
story: The dwarfs are a stubborn group, but they will serve you well as allies; you need every help you can get
nav: enter 1 to go to Mount Doom or 2 toDDD

name: Dragon Stone
story: With the help of the dwarfs you can give these orcs a good fight

name: Mount Doom
story: How will go past these dragons spitting fire everywhere? Don't you wish you have Donkey here to talk these dragons out of kiling you
nav: enter 1 to go to Meteora or 2 to DDD or 3 toDragon Stone

name: Meteora
story: Hurray!! You found one gem, the mission is just partly done
nav: enter 1 to go to RFC or 2 to TGN or 3 to Belge Armoury
